programme.title: Built For The Kill
programme.desc: The polar bear is the world's largest land predator-but it's born blind and deaf. How does a helpless cub become a successful killer? programme.title: Built For The Kill

programme.desc: In the wild, beasts of all sizes clash: From love-struck Grizzlies, to raging buffalo, to a snake's mistaken identity and a double dose of gang warfare. programme.title: Animal Fight Club
